ingredients.content: fresh flat-leaf parsley, leaves only, to taste
1 spring onion/shallot, trimmed, cut into pieces
1 pinch ground black pepper, to taste
250 g cream cheese, cut into pieces

preparations.content: Place fresh parsley, walnuts, spring onion/shallot, salt and ground black pepper into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add mayonnaise and cream cheese and mix <b>12 sec/speed 4.5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add canned tuna and mix <b>15 sec/speed 5<b>. Serve immediately.
